trans-unit.source: The XpsImage class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: La classe XpsImage non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>per aggiungere un'immagine e ottenere un riferimento a esso un nuovo documento.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A> method to obtain an image reference in an existing document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>per ottenere un riferimento all'immagine in un documento esistente.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the XpsImage class may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: In base alle impostazioni di <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, l'operazione di scaricamento del <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>metodo della classe XpsImage pu√≤ essere ritardata fino al completo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>viene chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>
